# Libraries

# Load and clean up data
```{r}
exps <- read.csv("./data/data.csv") %>% as_tibble()

exps <- exps %>% 
  mutate(experiment = as.factor(experiment)) %>% 
  mutate(winner = as.factor(winner))
```
